conbody.p: Component interaction view displays the graphical representation of interaction between selected component with other components. This view shown only when you accessing a component from landscape view(by double click).

At first the view shows all the products interact with selected component with arrow mark from the selected component to the product(see the figure). Then if you access a product it will show the components interacted with selected component with arrow mark from the product to the components(see the figure).

For clear understanding below figure shows that the component AA_CHANGEPRODUCT was selected from landscape view which connected to the product EB and AA. If you double click on the EB node you can see that the component interacted with the selected component AA_CHANGEPRODUCT is EB_UTILITY, EB_DATAACCESS, EB_TEMPLATE and EB_ERRORPROCESSING. The purpose of grouping the component as product is for skip out the complexity of interaction view.
